title: Biohazard Quarantine Zone Adventure #73
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Decontamination Chamber
rooms.description: A sterile white chamber with flickering fluorescent lights. Warning signs cover the walls showing biohazard symbols. Chemical showers line one wall, and the air smells of disinfectant. A hazmat suit hangs on a hook. Through a reinforced window, you can see the contaminated research lab beyond.

items.name: emergency supply locker
items.description: A metal locker with medical supplies and emergency equipment

items.name: incident report document
items.description: An official report about the containment breach
items.text: INCIDENT REPORT: Containment breach occurred on March 47th (03/47) in Lab Sector 7. Dr. Sarah Chen was the lead researcher. The pathogen designation is Omega Strain. All personnel must evacuate through the emergency exit in the safe room.

items.name: level one security keycard
items.description: A white keycard with a single red stripe and security clearance level one

items.name: protective hazmat suit
items.description: A full body protective suit hanging on the wall

items.name: folded research notes
items.description: Handwritten notes stuffed in the hazmat suit pocket
items.text: Dr. Chen's notes: The cure samples are stored in the biosecure containment locker in the research lab. Remember: only authorized personnel with level two clearance can access the quarantine corridor. The master override keycard is in my office safe.

items.name: reinforced laboratory door
items.description: A heavy door with a card reader leading into the contaminated research lab

rooms.name: Contaminated Research Laboratory
rooms.description: A large laboratory with overturned equipment and shattered glass. Biohazard warnings flash on computer screens. Microscopes and centrifuges sit abandoned on lab benches. A sealed containment locker stands against the far wall. Papers are scattered everywhere, and an office door leads to a side room.

items.name: laboratory computer terminal
items.description: A computer screen displaying security protocols and warnings
items.text: SECURITY ALERT: Pathogen Omega Strain has breached containment. Lead researcher Dr. Sarah Chen initiated emergency protocols. Evacuation route: Proceed to quarantine corridor, then access the safe room for emergency exit.

items.name: scattered research papers
items.description: Papers and documents strewn across the floor

items.name: sticky note with numbers
items.description: A yellow sticky note with numbers written on it

items.name: biosecure containment locker
items.description: A reinforced storage locker with biohazard markings and a heavy lock

items.name: experimental cure sample
items.description: A vial containing the experimental cure for the Omega Strain pathogen

items.name: office door
items.description: A door leading to the lead researcher's private office

items.name: quarantine corridor door
items.description: A sealed door with a card reader requiring level two security clearance

rooms.name: Lead Researcher Office
rooms.description: A small office with a desk covered in research journals and coffee cups. Diplomas hang on the wall showing Dr. Sarah Chen's credentials. A wall safe is partially hidden behind a filing cabinet. Family photos sit on the desk.

items.name: desk drawer
items.description: A drawer in the researcher's desk

items.name: personal journal
items.description: Dr. Chen's personal research journal
items.text: Journal Entry: The Omega Strain is more dangerous than we thought. I've secured the level two keycard in my wall safe. The master override keycard can open any door in the facility in case of emergency. I pray we never need it.

items.name: wall safe
items.description: A small safe mounted in the wall with a combination lock

items.name: level two security keycard
items.description: A blue keycard with two red stripes and security clearance level two

items.name: master override keycard
items.description: A black keycard with gold stripes that can override any lock in the facility

rooms.name: Quarantine Corridor
rooms.description: A long corridor with red emergency lighting. Containment doors line both sides. Warning klaxons echo through the hallway. At the end of the corridor, a massive security door blocks access to the safe room. A security terminal displays three verification questions.

items.name: emergency medical kit
items.description: A red medical kit mounted on the wall

items.name: evacuation procedure document
items.description: Official instructions for emergency evacuation
items.text: EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of containment breach, proceed to safe room. Security verification required. Personnel must confirm: lead researcher identity, pathogen designation, and evacuation destination.

items.name: wall mounted security terminal
items.description: A computer terminal displaying facility information
items.text: FACILITY STATUS: Critical containment breach. All personnel must evacuate. Safe room access requires security verification. Emergency exit leads to external decontamination area.

items.name: reinforced safe room door
items.description: A massive steel door with a security verification system. Three questions must be answered correctly.

password_questions.question: Who was the lead researcher?
password_questions.hint: Check the incident report and office credentials

password_questions.question: What is the pathogen designation?
password_questions.hint: The incident report and computer terminal mention this

password_questions.question: Where does the emergency exit lead?
password_questions.hint: Read the security terminal information carefully

rooms.name: Emergency Safe Room
rooms.description: You have reached the safe room! A clean, pressurized chamber with green lighting indicating safe air quality. Emergency supplies line the walls. A large airlock door with a glowing green exit sign leads to freedom. Through the window, you can see the outside world waiting.

items.name: emergency supply cache
items.description: Shelves stocked with food, water, and medical supplies for survivors

items.name: emergency communication panel
items.description: A radio system for contacting rescue teams
items.text: AUTOMATED MESSAGE: Rescue teams have been notified. Decontamination complete. You are clear to exit through the emergency airlock.

items.name: emergency exit airlock
items.description: A secure airlock leading to the outside. The master override keycard can open it immediately.

rooms.name: External Decontamination Area
rooms.description: You step out into fresh air and sunlight! The quarantine facility stands behind you, sealed and contained. Emergency vehicles and hazmat teams are arriving. You made it out safely with the cure sample. The nightmare is over.

items.name: hazmat rescue team
items.description: Emergency responders in protective gear ready to help survivors

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have escaped the biohazard quarantine zone with the experimental cure sample! The facility is now sealed, and the Omega Strain will be contained. Thanks to your quick thinking and puzzle-solving skills, the cure can be mass-produced and the outbreak stopped. You are a hero! You win!
